cloud_storage_capacity.description: The total amount of cloud-based data storage available at the end of the reporting period, measured in terabytes.

employees_total_layoffs.description: The total number of employees that were laid off or terminated during the reporting period.

cash_flow_from_operations.description: The cash generated (or used) by the company’s core operating activities during the reporting period, expressed in the relevant currency.

largest_single_executive_compensation.description: The highest single expenditure on executive compensation during the reporting period, expressed in the specified currency.

gross_margin_percentage.description: The percentage of gross profit relative to revenue, calculated as (Revenue - Cost of Goods Sold) / Revenue * 100.

year_end_box_office_market_share.description: The company's share of the overall box office market at year-end, typically expressed as a percentage. If not applicable, the value should be 'N/A'.

total_power_generation_capacity.description: The total power generation capacity at year-end, measured in megawatts (MW).

active_pharmaceutical_patents.description: The total count of active pharmaceutical patents held by the company at the end of the reporting period.

total_patent_count.description: The overall number of patents held by the company, including those in specialized sectors (e.g., aerospace tech).

active_licensing_deals.description: The total count of active licensing agreements the company has at year-end.

dividend_per_share.description: The dividend amount paid per share during the reporting period, expressed in the specified currency.

fleet_size.description: The total number of vehicles in the company’s fleet at the end of the reporting period.

number_of_hotels.description: The count of hotels operated or owned by the company at year-end.

number_of_fulfillment_centers.description: The total number of fulfillment centers operated by the company at the end of the reporting period.

non_performing_loan_ratio.description: The ratio (or percentage) of loans that are non-performing compared to the total loan portfolio.

capital_expenditures.description: The total monetary amount spent on capital investments during the reporting period, expressed in the specified currency.

rnd_spending_advanced_programs.description: The amount spent on advanced research and development programs during the reporting period, expressed in the specified currency.

clinical_trial_sites.description: The number of clinical trial sites that are operational at the end of the reporting period.

total_revenue.description: The aggregate revenue generated by the company during the reporting period, expressed in the specified currency.

fleet_average_co2_emissions.description: The average carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions per vehicle within the company's fleet.

healthcare_professionals_on_staff.description: The total number of healthcare professionals employed by the company at year-end.

renewable_energy_percentage.description: The percentage of the company’s total power capacity that is derived from renewable energy sources.

year_end_customer_base.description: The total number of active customers or users at the end of the reporting period.

total_expensed_rnd_expenditure.description: The total research and development expenditure that was expensed during the reporting period, expressed in the specified currency.

generic_product_count.description: The total number of generic products available in the company's portfolio.

hybrid_models_count.description: The number of hybrid vehicle models available from the company at year-end.

active_software_licenses.description: The total count of active software licenses held by the company at year-end.

total_deposits.description: The total amount of deposits held by the company at year-end, expressed in the specified currency.
